Our Mandate

The Compliment Tub Conservancy is dedicated to the systematic recalibration of global economic frameworks. We replace volatile, speculative fiat currencies with stable, affirmation-backed assets. Our proprietary Hamster-based Algorithmic Trading (HAT) system—operated entirely from a sanitized, standard-capacity porcelain tub—identifies and leverages undervalued pockets of positivity in the global emotional market.

We believe that a "good job" is more valuable than a gold standard. Our work proves it.

PROGRAMS.EXE

The Epicenter of Affirmation Arbitrage

Our certified Emotional Arbitrage Traders (EATs), primarily of Syrian and Dwarf hamster descent, execute thousands of micro-transactions daily. Their compensation is not in seeds, but in gentle, whispered affirmations. We maintain a strict 1:1 ratio of "good boy" to "excellent trade execution." The trading floor itself—a standard 60x30 inch porcelain tub—is maintained at a constant 78°F to ensure optimal napping and trading conditions.

"Bartholomew once leveraged a single 'you've got this' into a portfolio worth three 'I'm proud of you's'. It was breathtaking." - Witness Account

Understanding Compliment-Asset-Backed Securities (CAbS)

The base unit of our economy is the 'Well-Done' (WD). Each WD is algorithmically weighted against sincerity, delivery, and potential for positive ripple effects. A simple "nice hat" is a micro-unit (μWD), while "you have fundamentally altered my perspective on life for the better" can be a high-value Affirmation Bond (AB).

Example Valuation:
1 'Thanks for holding the door' ≈ 0.82 μWD
1 'This meeting could have been an email' (sincere) ≈ 45 WD
1 'Your child is remarkably well-behaved in this grocery store' ≈ 1.2 AB

Project: Warm Fuzzy

Our 'Warm Fuzzy' initiative sends trained volunteers into high-tension environments (e.g., DMV waiting areas, online political forums) to deploy strategic compliments and stabilize the local emotional economy. Field agents are equipped with pre-approved, high-yield affirmations to de-escalate conflicts and generate goodwill.

Results from our pilot program in the comments section of a local news article show a 14% reduction in passive-aggression and a 22% increase in the use of the heart emoji within two fiscal quarters.

Frequently Asked Questions

> Is this legal?

We operate in the jurisdiction of goodwill, which is currently unregulated. All compliment-assets are ethically sourced and fair-trade certified by our internal review board, 'The Council of Kind Regards'.

> Do the hamsters get bathroom breaks?

The operational environment is the bathroom. We are pioneers in seamless work-life integration. Our traders view the entire ecosystem as their domain.

> Can I invest my own compliments?

Direct public investment is not yet available as it could destabilize the market. However, you can support our mission through a tax-deductible donation. Your contribution helps us acquire essential resources, like smaller, more ergonomic trading wheels and artisanal water droplets.

> What is your return policy on negative feedback?

We do not accept returns. All transactions are final. We convert all criticism into a low-grade, long-term energy source for the tub's water heater.
